title: What is wrong with ranked matchmaking in Solo/Duo

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I was playing ranked solo/duo and I come across a Jinx that is unranked and she said that it was her first time playing adc in ranked during the game instead of telling us before it and she ended up having like 11 cs at 10 minutes there was also a Maokai that played okay and he was also unranked. On the other team though there was 3 silvers and 2 golds. Could someone please explain what the hell is wrong with this matchmaking? There is no way that this is how it's suppose to work if one team gets 2 Unranked players and the other with 2 Golds. Especially if people are trying to climb

replies.body: mate that {{champion:120}}  was diamond last season. You should be madder at that.

It's obvious what happened friend.

Matchmaker chose YOU.

You were chosen to lead those two ranked virgins through their first real game of League of Legends. There may have been others that could of done it, but YOU are the Gold anointed.

How can you not be HONORED?

You have the privilege of mmr that is near exactly the same as the mmr of unrankeds, which is between silver 1 and gold 5. EDIT: Between silver 3 and 5.

Many seek the same honor, ie. all those **** bronze tryhards.

But YOU are the one.

Silver 4 is the Start MMR of all accounts.

Also Re: OP you have to remember it's likely that most of the players in any game only play during school holidays.
